BBEX3.A.CNY.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in China / EUR 1 = CNY ... (middle)
Source: Since 2008: People's Bank of China, Peking. Until 2007: Bank of China, Frankfurt branch.

Methodology: Until December 2005, calculated on the basis of daily buying and selling rates, and from 2006 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates. From 2008, calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end middle rates, from 2012 on the basis of month-end rates.
